TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Ciyaw-i-pu, title = Ciyaw-i-pu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ciyaw-i-pu} }

S.FORM: Ciyaw-i-pu U mikuwanay atu misiremuday tu sapasubana', matiya u milaylayay tu tireng atu sapatatudung tu kapay a tarakaway a seyhu, atu mikantukay tu i niyaniyaru'anay a pasubana' a sitatudungay a seyhu nu mita. Siremud han a patatudung, u milesimetay, u misiremuday tu sapasubana' atu papasubanaan a tarakaway a seyhu nu mita. Pi'arawan to lakaw 教育部全球資訊網

Ciyaw-i-po U mikowanay ato misiremoday to sapasobana', matiya o milaylayay to tireng ato sapatatodong to kapay a tarakaway a seyho, ato mikantokay to i niyaniyaro'anay a pasobana' a sitatodongay a seyho no mita. Siremod han a patatodong, o milesimetay, o misiremoday to sapasobana' ato papasobanaan a tarakaway a seyho no mita. Pi'arawan to lakaw 教育部全球資訊網
